Kaouther Ben Hania (amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Tunisia. Beauty and the Dogs (2017), ihe nkiri ya a ma ama, bu nke ahọpụtara dị ka ntinye Tunisian maka Best Foreign Language Film na 91st Academy Awards. A họpụtara ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2020 The Man Who Sold His Skin maka Best International Feature Film na 93rd Academy Awards
A mụrụ Kaouther Ben Hania na Sidi Bouzid
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ecole des Arts et du Cinéma (EDAC) na Tunisia, mgbe ahụ ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Na La Fémis na Sorbonne na Paris.
